metadata.title: CVE-2021-44855 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in MediaWiki before 1.35.5, 1.36.x before 1.36.3,and 1.37.x before 1.37.1. There is Blind Stored XSS via a URL to the UploadImage feature.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-44855` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mediawiki - 1:1.35.5-1
mediawiki-classes - 1:1.35.5-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.35.5-1').
